quoteText: If you would like to delete your Account, please e-mail us at community@brainly.com.
title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: From Terms of Service, "If you would like to delete your Account, please e-mail us at community@brainly.com." Also from https://faq.brainly.com/hc/en-us/articles/206192659-How-can-I-delete-my-account-, it presents three ways to delete an account.
